original: Saññojanaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nosaññojano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe… ganthaṁ
analyzed: saññojanam dhammam paṭicca nosaññojanaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā pe

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca nogantho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe… oghaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca noganthaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā pe ogham dhammam paṭicca

original: noogho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe… yogaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca noyogo dhammo uppajjati
analyzed: nooghaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā pe yogam dhammam paṭicca noyogaḥ dhammo uppajjati

original: hetupaccayā …pe… nīvaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nonīvaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: hetu paccayā pe nīvaraṇam dhammam paṭicca no nīvaraṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: hetuyāḥ nava pe vipāke ekam pe avigate nava
